code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import Hero from'./components/Hero';import Trending from'./components/Trending';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isNavbarVisible,setIsNavbarVisible]=useState(true);const[lastScrollY,setLastScrollY]=useState(0);const[isLinkClicked,setIsLinkClicked]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const controlNavbar=()=>{if(!isLinkClicked){if(typeof window!=='undefined'){if(window.scrollY>lastScrollY+30){setIsNavbarVisible(false);}else if(window.scrollY<lastScrollY){setIsNavbarVisible(true);}setLastScrollY(window.scrollY);}}else{setIsLinkClicked(false);}};if(typeof window!=='undefined'){window.addEventListener('scroll',controlNavbar);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',controlNavbar);};}},[lastScrollY,isLinkClicked]);const handleLinkClick=()=>{setIsLinkClicked(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-background text-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{isVisible:isNavbarVisible,onLinkClick:handleLinkClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Hero,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"trending",className:"container mx-auto container-padding py-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Trending,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"discover",className:"container mx-auto container-padding section-padding"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"playlists",className:"container mx-auto container-padding section-padding"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"artists",className:"container mx-auto container-padding section-padding"})]});}export default App;
